mapper.select: SELECT ttm1.teamname_kr AS team1, ttm2.teamname_kr AS team2, tkt.team1 AS code1, tkt.team2 AS code2, tkt.match_code AS matchcode FROM tbl_kboschedule_ttp tkt JOIN tbl_team_mt01 ttm1 ON tkt.team1 = ttm1.team_code JOIN tbl_team_mt01 ttm2 ON tkt.team2 = ttm2.team_code WHERE CAST(tkt.game_date AS DATE) = CURRENT_DATE;

SELECT ttm1.teamname_kr AS team1, ttm2.teamname_kr AS team2, tmt.team1 AS code1, tmt.team2 AS code2, tmt.match_code AS matchcode FROM tbl_mlbschedule_ttp tmt JOIN tbl_team_mt01 ttm1 ON tmt.team1 = ttm1.team_code JOIN tbl_team_mt01 ttm2 ON tmt.team2 = ttm2.team_code WHERE CAST(tmt.game_date AS DATE) = CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '1 DAY';

SELECT tgt.team1, tgt.team2, ttm1.teamname_kr AS team1name, ttm2.teamname_kr AS team2name, tgt.team1_winrate, tgt.team2_winrate, tgt.team1_score, tgt.team2_score, tgt.game_analysis, tgt.match_code as matchcode FROM tbl_gptexepect_ttp tgt INNER JOIN tbl_team_mt01 ttm1 ON tgt.team1 = ttm1.team_code INNER JOIN tbl_team_mt01 ttm2 ON tgt.team2 = ttm2.team_code WHERE tgt.match_code = #{matchcode} ORDER BY tgt.team1 -- 여기서 원하는 컬럼으로 정렬 LIMIT 1;

select distinct ttm1.teamname_kr as winteam, ttm2.teamname_kr as loseteam, tmn.winteam as winteamcode, tmn.loseteam as lostteamcode, tmn.winscore as winscore, tmn.losescore as losescore, tmn.game_date from ${leagueTbl} tmn inner join tbl_team_mt01 ttm1 on ttm1.team_code = tmn.winteam inner join tbl_team_mt01 ttm2 on ttm2.team_code = tmn.loseteam where tmn.game_date like #{selym}

SELECT tgt.team1, tgt.team2, ttm1.teamname_kr AS team1name, ttm2.teamname_kr as team2name, tgt.team1_winrate, tgt.team2_winrate, tgt.team1_score, tgt.team2_score, tgt.game_analysis, tgt.match_code as matchcode FROM tbl_gptexepect_ttp tgt INNER JOIN tbl_team_mt01 ttm1 ON tgt.team1 = ttm1.team_code INNER JOIN tbl_team_mt01 ttm2 ON tgt.team2 = ttm2.team_code WHERE tgt.team1 = #{teamCode2} AND tgt.team2 = #{teamCode1} LIMIT 1
select brdno ,cmt_memo as memo ,cmt_user as user from tbl_commnet_nt01 tcn where tcn.brdno = #{brdno} and del_flag ='N' order by cmt_date asc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_commnet_nt01 (brdno ,cmt_memo, cmt_date, cmt_user, last_date, last_user) values (#{brdno}, #{memo}, now(), #{pid}, now(), #{pid});

insert into tbl_board_nt01 (brd_code, match_code, title, memo, brd_date, brd_user, last_date,last_user) values(#{brdcode},#{matchcode} ,#{title} ,#{game_analysis},now() ,#{adduser} ,now() , #{adduser} )
